alice.respect.core

Class TransducerManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • alice.respect.core.TransducerManager

  • public class TransducerManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class used for managing transducers. It can be used for environment configuration and as a provider of information concerning transducer's associations.

        Creates a new transducer
